description: Accelerated insurance product onboarding by 75% via full-stack solutions (Angular, Java, Quarkus, Kubernetes). Built reusable frontend components, raised code coverage to 80%, optimized performance with caching & NgRx (30% faster loads), mentored 10+ juniors, led reviews, contributed to micro-frontend and backend APIs, and built an automated L&D hiring solution reducing manual effort by 98%.
